name: Hot Shots Shorties Yellow Pack
description:
From the creators of the Hot Shots franchise, comes Hot Shots Shorties™ - a fun collection of mini games where players can test their might in a variety of wacky situations. The Hot Shots Shorties™ Yellow Pack contains Vacuum Dash, Clean-up Hitter and Tillage Pillage games.

Hot Shots Shorties © 2010 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. Hot Shots Shorties is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item’s use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
